name: 2018-IEEE 3rd International Conference on Signal and Image Processing ICSIP
content: Conference official website：http://www.icsip.org Meeting time：July 13-15, 2018 Meeting place：1085 Heping Road, Luohu, 518010 Shenzhen, China Shenzhen Research Institute, Southeast University, China Published by：All accepted papers after proper registration and presentation,will be included in the conference proceedings and submitted for inclusion to IEEE Xplore as well as Ei Compendex and Scopus Index,which is the same with the last two years. ICSIP 2017 conference proceedings has been included in the IEEE Xplore ICSIP 2016 Conference proceedings has been included in IEEE Xplore and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. Paper Submission: June 10, 2018 Submission instructions： 1.Prospective authors anr invited to submit original,high quality papers which is original and has not been submitted and published elsewhere 2.Manuscripts should be at least 4 full pages and at most 10pages. 3.The reviewing process of the ICSIP conference aims to provide authors with constructive feedback in their papers,eveb when a submission is rejected.All submissions will be subjected to double-blind peer reviews,who are expert or hace been experiencing in the related field for years.The accepted papers must be revised,taking into consideration the referees’ comments and suggestions,before inclusion in the conference proceedings.
